page.title: 18Customs. Events.
page.content: {The Cuckoo Fair. }Downton's major event of the year is the Cuckoo Fair. This tradition goes back many years and is always held over the May Bank Holiday. It lasts 3 days. The first day is Saturday.The fair goes along the Borough and in the Memorial gardens.Marquees and stalls are set out.The stalls and side shows include Punch and Judy, bric- a- brac and craft. On Sunday a tea dance is held for the elderly.In the evening there is a band concert.On Monday the procession is lead through the village by the Prince and Princess, who are chosen from the 2 Downton schools. After the procession is a fancy dress competition. At the same time side shows are put into action.There is also Maypole dancing.It is a great weekend for all ages.
